scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Chris
scrape.text: The only thing I knew going into this book was it was a story about a dinner between two brothers and they needed to talk about their children. You, too, should only know that going into this and enjoy the ride. Although, enjoy is a relative term; perhaps take the ride on a winding road and see where it takes you. Just when you think the curve goes to the right, there will be something in the road and you will have to go left.
